backup.firstLaunchMessage: Would you like to restore data from a previous backup?
backup.passwordDescription: Enter the password used when creating the backup
backup.strategyDescription: How should we handle existing data?
backup.conflictsDescription: These records exist in both backup and local storage

strategy.title: Restore Strategy
strategy.mergeDesc: Keep all local data, only add new records from backup
strategy.replaceDesc: Delete local data and replace with backup
strategy.newerWinsDesc: Compare timestamps and keep the most recent version

documentRequest.title: What do you need?
documentRequest.subtitle: Choose the requested service.
documentRequest.sickNoteDesc: Request a certificate of incapacity for work

prescription.title: Request prescription
prescription.subtitle: Please enter the medication information.
prescription.infoText: Your request will be encrypted and sent to the practice. You will be notified when it is ready.

referral.title: Request referral
referral.subtitle: Please select the desired specialty.
referral.infoText: Your request will be encrypted and sent to the practice for review.

sickNote.title: Request sick note
sickNote.subtitle: Please provide the period of incapacity for work.
sickNote.infoText: A sick note can only be issued after medical review.
sickNote.warningText: A certificate of incapacity for work can only be issued after consultation with a doctor.
sickNote.errorStartDateRequired: Please enter a valid start date (DD.MM.YYYY).
sickNote.errorEndBeforeStart: End date must not be before start date.

requestSummary.title: Summary
requestSummary.subtitle: Please review your information.
requestSummary.encryptionInfo: ğŸ”’ Your data is encrypted with AES-256. Only your practice can decrypt it.
requestSummary.successMessage: Your request has been opened in your email client.
requestSummary.noEmailClient: No email client found. Please install one.

auth.accountLocked: Account locked due to too many failed attempts. Please wait.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
auth.registrationSuccessMessage: You can now log in. Set up 2FA in settings for extra security.
auth.twoFactorSubtitle: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
auth.twoFactorHelp: Open your authenticator app (e.g. Google Authenticator) and enter the current code.
auth.securityInfo: Your credentials are encrypted with PBKDF2. Enable 2FA for additional security.

therapistDashboard.title: Dashboard
therapistDashboard.encryptionActive: End-to-end encryption active. All patient data protected with AES-256-GCM.

appointments.conflict: Schedule conflict: This time slot is already taken.
appointments.pastDate: Cannot schedule appointments in the past.
appointments.cancelConfirm: Do you really want to cancel this appointment?
appointments.cannotReschedule: Cancelled or completed appointments cannot be rescheduled.

video.title: Video Session
video.subtitle: Secure, encrypted video communication (WebRTC/DTLS-SRTP)
video.inviteCopiedMessage: Send this link to your patient for the online session.
video.sessionEndedMessage: Would you like to create notes for this session?
video.browserRequired: Please open a browser for the video session.
video.securityInfo:
â€¢ Video streams encrypted with DTLS-SRTP
â€¢ No session recording
â€¢ Room ID is unique and non-guessable
â€¢ GDPR compliant: No video/audio data stored
video.compatNote: Supported: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge. For mobile devices, the Jitsi Meet app is recommended.

notes.title: Session Notes
notes.subtitle: Encrypted notes â€” visible only to you.
notes.encryptionRequired: Encryption key required. Please enter password first.
notes.gdprInfo: All notes are encrypted with AES-256-GCM. Only you as therapist can decrypt them. GDPR Art. 9: Health data is stored exclusively locally and encrypted.
